message: Let's be fair, Bob. This gives us both a good deal.
Alice, my turn. I think this is more reflective of the situation, don't you?
Bob, this is the same offer you just gave me, only reversed. It's clear we both want a good share, so let's be reasonable and end this here.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  We both lose if we keep dragging this out.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
